answers.answer: I feel you! & I have GD also.. Found out at 28 weeks and now I'm 34! I'm so ready for it to be over
Very tired! It's so hard getting out of bed in the mornings now. And after work I am exhausted. I usually nap after work and then sleep all night as well.
I hear you ladies.I'm 33 weeks 3 days and feeling tired. Pain when I sleep, bud is moving a lot, so am not getting a lot of sleep. Last day at work tomorrow thank god.
I'm 37w 6d and I'm solo exhausted. I just feel tired even after naps. This summer heat is no help at all neither.

question: I'm so ready for my bundle of joy to get here my hips and legs hurt so bad, and I just found out I have gestational diabetes smh
title: Anyone as tired as I am??
